```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(thematic)
thematic_on(bg="#222E32", fg="#FCFCFD", accent=c("#9ABEBE", "#789494"))
pal <- okabe_ito()

```

```{r}

plot(1:10, 2:11, t="o", col=1:10, cex=2)
grid()
lattice::show.settings()

```

```{r cover}

ggplot(airquality, aes(x=Temp, fill=factor(Day))) + 
  geom_histogram(color="white") +
  scale_fill_manual(values=sample(pal, 31, replace=T))

```
